attributes.action: Body Image classes compulsory  in school.
attributes.additional_details: We are campaigning to make body image classes compulsory in schools. This is an issue we feel very strongly about. We believe that if classes like the one Gok Wan has taken are compulsory more teenagers will be happy with their body image and less eating disorders will be developed ect. We would like the classes to be given at high school because this is when most eating disorders are developed.
